name: Replay - VHS is not dead
description: Replay: VHS is not dead is a puzzle/ platform game, set in a movie-based universe. Record your characters’ movements. Use the remote control powers to bend time. Change character and play again to combine their actions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8  Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz or equivalent processor  Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: REALLY ENJOYED IT     nice artstyle, simple concept: move/switch characters, push buttons, boxes,  think /puzzle a bit, match timing...  not really challenging but fun to me  NO MUST + NO FUSS
